title: STUDIO in East Hollywood ^ Wood Style Floors ^ Gas Range
posting_body: ['Very charming studio inside a Beautiful Old Hollywood-style building.', 'Located right off Fountain, walking distance from many restaurants and shops.', 'Less than a 5-minute drive to Silver Lake, Los Feliz, and Virgil Village.', 'There is only 1 apartment available.', 'The exposed brick wall makes this one a gem!', '\u200b\u200b\u200b\u200b\u200b\u200b\u200bYou also have access to a common area w/ BBQ — host the dinner party of your dreams, under charming string lights.', 'Other amenities include Bike storage and in-building laundry.', 'Come see it today.', 'CONTACT INFORMATION', 'show contact info', '<URL>', 'LOCATION', '1172 North New Hampshire Avenue Los Angeles, CA 90029', 'APARTMENT AMENITIES', 'Microwave', 'Refrigerator', 'Gas Range', 'Ceiling Fans', 'Vinyl Plank Flooring', 'COMMUNITY AMENITIES', 'Controlled Access', 'Bike Storage', 'Outdoor BBQ', 'Outdoor Lounge', 'Laundry On-Site', 'LOCATION BENEFITS', 'Nearby Freeways: 110, 101, 10, 5', 'Restaurants: California Grill, Messhall Kitchen', 'Entertainment: Hollywood & Highland, Pantages Theater', 'Close Shopping: Trader Joes, Vons, Ralphs', "Schools: LA Recording School, Musician's Institute, Hollywood High School", 'Close Cities: Los Feliz, Silverlake, Hollywood, Glendale', 'LEASE TERMS:', '12 Months Preferred.', 'Other Lease Terms May Be Considered.']
